trans-unit.source: Represents a client script element in a Web Form or user control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Representa um elemento de script de cliente em um formulário da Web ou controle de usuário em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The ClientScriptItem class represents a `script` element that is contained in a Web document at design time.
trans-unit.target: ClientScriptItem classe representa um `script` elemento que está contido em um documento da Web em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A custom control designer implementation can use a ClientScriptItem object to add client script elements to a Web Form or user control.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação de designer de controle personalizado pode usar um objeto ClientScriptItem para adicionar elementos de script de cliente a um controle de formulário da Web ou de usuário.

trans-unit.source: At design time, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> class to set or examine client script elements that are contained in a document, such as a Web form, a Web server control, a content page, or a master page, on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Em tempo de design, use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>classe para definir ou examinar os elementos de script de cliente que estão contidos em um documento, como um formulário da Web, um controle de servidor Web, uma página de conteúdo ou uma página mestra, na superfície de design.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Retrieve the collection of client script elements that are contained within the Web document by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Recuperar a coleção de elementos de script de cliente que estão contidos dentro do documento da Web usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.GetClientScriptsInDocument%2A>

trans-unit.source: Add a client script element to the Web document by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.AddClientScriptToDocument%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar um elemento de script de cliente para o documento da Web usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.AddClientScriptToDocument%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner.AddClientScriptToDocument%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, a `script` element either contains script statements or specifies an external location for script statements.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, um `script` elemento contém instruções de script ou especifica um local externo para instruções de script.

trans-unit.source: The `script` element can optionally define the language of the script statements.
trans-unit.target: O `script` elemento pode, opcionalmente, definir o idioma das instruções de script.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor to initialize the properties for a new script object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A>construtor para inicializar as propriedades para um novo objeto de script.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the ClientScriptItem properties to examine the `script` object attributes and contents.
trans-unit.target: Use as propriedades ClientScriptItem para examinar o `script` atributos e conteúdo do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Language%2A> property represents the `language` attribute of the `script` element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Language%2A>propriedade representa o `language` atributo o `script` elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Language%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Source%2A> property represents the `src` attribute.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Source%2A>propriedade representa o `src` atributo.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Text%2A> property represents the script statements to be executed on the client that are contained in the `script` element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Text%2A>propriedade representa as instruções de script a ser executado no cliente que estão contidos no `script` elemento.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the ClientScriptItem class to manage scripts that are to be executed at design-time.
trans-unit.target: Use a classe ClientScriptItem para gerenciar scripts que serão executadas em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: To manage client script elements at run time, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager> class.
trans-unit.target: Para gerenciar os elementos de script de cliente em tempo de execução, use a <xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.ClientScriptManager>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using client scripts at run time, see [Client Script in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como usar scripts de cliente em tempo de execução, consulte [Script de cliente em páginas da Web do ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ClientScriptItem class represents `script` elements at design time that are ultimately parsed and run in the client browser.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ClientScriptItem a classe representa `script` elementos em tempo de design que, por fim, analisado e executado no navegador cliente.

trans-unit.source: Because the `script` elements that are generated for the ClientScriptItem objects are not run on the server, the elements do not contain the `runat="server"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: Porque o `script` elementos que são gerados para os objetos ClientScriptItem não são executados no servidor, os elementos não contêm o `runat="server"` atributo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem"></xref> class using the provided parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem"> </xref> classe usando os parâmetros fornecidos.

trans-unit.source: Initialize the statements for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem> object by using either the `text` or `source` parameter (not both).
trans-unit.target: Inicializar as instruções para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem>objeto usando o `text` ou `source` parâmetro (não ambos).</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem>

trans-unit.source: Use `text` to initialize the script using an input string that contains the statements.
trans-unit.target: Use `text` para inicializar o script usando uma cadeia de caracteres de entrada que contém as instruções.

trans-unit.source: Alternately, use `source` to initialize a script using a path that contains the script statements.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, use `source` para inicializar um script usando um caminho que contém as instruções de script.

trans-unit.source: You can specify any of the input parameters as `null` or an empty string (""); the corresponding property is set using the input value, and the `script` element is generated without that property.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar qualquer um dos parâmetros de entrada como `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""); a propriedade correspondente é definida usando o valor de entrada e o `script` elemento é gerado sem essa propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Using `null` or an empty string ("") generates the following results: - For `text`, the corresponding `script` element does not contain script statements.
trans-unit.target: Usando `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia ("") gera os seguintes resultados: - para `text`, correspondente `script` elemento não contém instruções de script.

trans-unit.source: - For `source`, the `src` attribute is not set in the `script` element.
trans-unit.target: -Para `source`, o `src` atributo não está definido no `script` elemento.

trans-unit.source: - For `language`, the `language` attribute is not set in the `script` element.
trans-unit.target: -Para `language`, o `language` atributo não está definido no `script` elemento.

trans-unit.source: When a client script block does not specify the script language, the client browser determines the language.
trans-unit.target: Quando um bloco de script de cliente não especifica a linguagem de script, o navegador do cliente determina o idioma.

trans-unit.source: - For `type`, the `type` attribute is not set in the script element.
trans-unit.target: -Para `type`, o `type` atributo não está definido no elemento do script.

trans-unit.source: When a client script block does not specify the script type, the client browser determines the type.
trans-unit.target: Quando um bloco de script de cliente não especifica o tipo de script, o navegador do cliente determina o tipo.

trans-unit.source: - For `id`, the design host (for example, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]) will throw an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.
trans-unit.target: -Para `id`, o host de design (por exemplo, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]) lançará um <xref:System.ArgumentNullException>.</xref:System.ArgumentNullException>

trans-unit.source: The contents for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element; a string of script statements to run on the client.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento; uma cadeia de caracteres de instruções de script para ser executado no cliente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute value for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element, specifying an external source location for the client script contents.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""> </xref> atributo de valor para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento, especificando um local de fonte externa para o conteúdo do script de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> attribute value for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element, specifying the language of the script statements.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""> </xref> atributo de valor para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento, especificando o idioma das instruções de script.

trans-unit.source: The type attribute value for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element, indicating the MIME type for the associated scripting engine.
trans-unit.target: O valor do atributo de tipo para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento, que indica o tipo MIME para o mecanismo de script associado.

trans-unit.source: The ID for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: A ID para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: This argument is required by the design host (for example, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]).
trans-unit.target: Esse argumento é necessário para o host de design (por exemplo, [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]).

trans-unit.source: id is null (thrown by the design host).
trans-unit.target: idé nulo (lançada pelo host de design).

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_ID" name="ID" href=""></xref> attribute value for the client script element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref uid="langword_csharp_ID" name="ID" href=""> </xref> valor do elemento de script de cliente do atributo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ID" name="ID" href=""></xref> value of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref uid="langword_csharp_ID" name="ID" href=""> </xref> valor o <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> attribute value for the client script element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""> </xref> valor do elemento de script de cliente do atributo.

trans-unit.source: The Language property represents the language in which the script statements are written.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de idioma representa o idioma no qual as instruções de script são gravadas.

trans-unit.source: If the Language property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `language` attribute is not set in the `script` element.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade de idioma é `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), o `language` atributo não está definido no `script` elemento.

trans-unit.source: When a client script block does not specify the script language, the client browser determines the language.
trans-unit.target: Quando um bloco de script de cliente não especifica a linguagem de script, o navegador do cliente determina o idioma.

trans-unit.source: The Language property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de idioma é inicializada, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The language name specified for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""></xref> attribute in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O nome do idioma especificado para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_language" name="language" href=""> </xref> atributo o <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute value for the client script element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""> </xref> valor do elemento de script de cliente do atributo.

trans-unit.source: The Source property specifies an external source location for the client script contents.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de origem Especifica um local de fonte externa para o conteúdo do script de cliente.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the script statements for a `script` element are specified using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Text%2A> or Source property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, as instruções de script para um `script` elemento são especificados usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Text%2A>ou propriedade de origem.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Source property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `src` attribute is not set in the `script` element.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade de origem for `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), o `src` atributo não está definido no `script` elemento.

trans-unit.source: The Source property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de origem é inicializada por <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path to the source file specified for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""></xref> attribute in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para o arquivo de origem especificado para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_src" name="src" href=""> </xref> atributo o <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the script statements contained in the client script element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as instruções de script contidas no elemento de script de cliente.

trans-unit.source: The Text property represents the statements that are contained in the `script` element.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de texto representa as instruções contidas no `script` elemento.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the script statements for a `script` element are specified using either the Text or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Source%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, as instruções de script para um `script` elemento são especificados usando o texto ou <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Source%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Text property is `null` or an empty string (""), the `script` element does not contain any script statements.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade Text é `null` ou uma cadeia de caracteres vazia (""), o `script` elemento não contém quaisquer instruções de script.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Source%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Source%2A>propriedade é inicializada através de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ClientScriptItem.Source%2A>

trans-unit.source: The script statements contained in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: As instruções de script contidas no <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_type" name="type" href=""></xref> attribute value for the client script element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref uid="langword_csharp_type" name="type" href=""> </xref> valor do elemento de script de cliente do atributo.

trans-unit.source: The name of the MIME type associated with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo de MIME associado a <xref uid="langword_csharp_script" name="script" href=""> </xref> elemento.
